items.sentence: Where were you between one and three o\'clock?
I\'m not sure that I want to give this to Tom.
I\'m older than any other student in my class.
I\'m sorry to have caused you so much trouble.
Are there any girls here you haven\'t yet met?
Are you saying you don\'t know how to do this?
Don\'t waste your time trying to convince Tom.
I ran as fast as I could to catch up with Tom.
I ran into an old friend of mine this morning.
I saw Tom pick it up and put it in his pocket.
